Deception {2}{W}{U}{B} [i]({2}{W}{U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Vigilance
Whenever Elric Nye, the Pirate King deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, if isn’t an extra turn, take an extra turn after this one.
